data.text: Kuomi ema aseponde, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Winj ywakna,
Kaka in lwandana kendo ohingana,
Gola oko e obadho mopondo mochikna
Aketo chunya e lweti;
Asin gi joma lamo nyiseche manono ma dhano oloso;
Abiro bedo mamor kendo moil kuom herani,
Ok iseketa e lwet jawasigu
Kecha, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nikech an e chandruok;
Ngimana rem chamo
Nikech wasigu olwora mang始eny,
Wigi owil koda mana ka gima ne asetho chon
Nikech awinjo ayany mang始eny ma ji yanyago,
To an aketo mana genona kuomi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
Ndalona ni e lweti;
Mad ibed mamor gi jatichni;
Kik iwe wiya kuodi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Mi dhogi mawacho miriambo mondo oling始;
Mano kaka berni duong始,
Ipandogi e bwombi iwuon
Pak obed ni Jehova Nyasaye,
Kane chandruok omaka to ne awacho ni,
Heruru Jehova Nyasaye un joge maler duto!
Beduru motegno kendo jiwuru chunyu,
